attributes.additional_details:
Dr Vanderpump told the Society for Endocrinology 'Data suggests UK is iodine deficient’ A study involving 700 teenage girls at nine UK centres found two thirds had an iodine deficiency.
http://astutehealthcare.co.uk/iodine-aqua/pdf/2011-bbcnews-Worrying-levels-of-iodine-deficiency-in-the-uk.pdf
https://data.unicef.org/topic/nutrition/iodine-deficiency/
http://www.who.int/nutrition/topics/idd/en/
http://www.ukiodine.org/professor-john-lazarus/
https://www.researchgate.net/publication/13659885
attributes.background: Iodine deficiency is linked to miscarriage,stillbirth,mental impairment,increase of perinatal and infant mortality. It is the commonest worldwide cause of thyroid disorders. Low iodine can cause hypothyroidism,goitre and can affect fertility, pregnancy and neurodevelopmental disorders in new-borns.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a petition calling on the UK Government to make it compulsory for manufacturers in the UK to add iodine to salt.
